segments.text: My wife and I didn't used to spend this much money .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My wife has been pregnant for 7 months .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I see . I guess diapers and baby food are expensive.Bringing up children is not easy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My wife will be going back to work soon .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You should have more money then .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes.We will need milk powder and bassinet .
segments.speaker: S1
